column1: Amaigbo is a large town in Imo State
column2: Nigeria. It is the headquarters of Nwangele Local Government Area. Amaigbo is regarded by many historians as the cradle of Igbo civilization.

column1: The town has an official post office.
Chief Dr. Walter Ofonagoro of Umuobi - former Minister of Information and Culture (Federal Republic of Nigeria) and former Director-General of the Nigerian Television Authority
King Jaja of Opobo - sold into slavery in pre-colonial Nigeria

column4: humanitarian and child protection expertPastor Chidi Ezimako-Pastor
